      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • join_event

      public Boolean join_event(Event event)
      Attempts to join an event.
      Parameters:
      event - event to be joined
      Returns:
      True if joined successfully false if already joined or did not join

    • unjoin_event

      public void unjoin_event(Event event)
      Removes the user from an event if their status is "joined". This also removes the user from the event's waitlist.
      Parameters:
      event - The event to be unjoined.
